title: Kaabil
description: The happy life of a young blind couple is shattered when the wife is raped and corrupt police won't help, sending the husband on a quest for revenge.
actors: Hrithik Roshan, Yami Gautam, Ronit Roy, Rohit Roy

title: Kaakan
description: Star-crossed lovers from different social strata struggle to overcome differences in class and family expectation, as well as a long separation.
actors: Jitendra Joshi, Urmila Kanitkar, Ashutosh Gaikwad, Ashok Shinde

title: Kaaliyan
description: An aggressive, wayward fisherman abandons his wife and daughters, who grow up to face the consequences of their father's mistakes.
actors: Tini Tom, Meghanathan, Balachandran Chullikadu, Shivaji Guruvayoor

title: Kabali (Hindi Version)
description: In this Hindi version of the Tamil blockbuster, a Tamil gang leader in Kuala Lumpur seeks justice for crimes committed against him and his family.
actors: Rajnikanth, Winston Chao, Radhika Apte, Nassar

title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
description: A dreamer falls for a girl who is in love with someone else and tries to create a rift between her and the man she loves.
actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Suchitra Krishnamoorthi, Deepak Tijori, Rita Bhaduri

title: Kaccha Limboo
description: After a misfit teen is caught forging his parents' signatures, he flees responsibility by running away from home and befriending a group of slum kids.
actors: Taher Sutterwala, Sarika, Atul Kulkarni, Chinmay Kambli

title: Kacche Dhaagey
description: While visiting India for her cousin's wedding, a Canadian girl develops strong feelings for a boy from a lower caste.
actors: Yograj Singh, Nitu Pandher, Deep Mandian, Shreya Chawla

title: Kahaani
description: Pregnant and alone in the city of Kolkata, a woman begins a relentless search for her missing husband, only to find that nothing is what it seems.

title: Kahi
description: A dancer, a drug dealer, a writer and a psychopath cross paths at a time when each is experiencing a moment of vulnerability.
actors: Harisharva, Krishi Thapanda, Matangi Prasan, Suraj Gowda

description: A troubled young girl and her mother find solace on a journey with a subversive poet whose words captivate their hearts and imaginations.
actors: Liam Neeson, Salma Hayek, John Krasinski, Frank Langella

description: Life is paradise for an upright young man and a sweet-natured girl until fate intervenes. Now they're separated by circumstances beyond their control.
actors: Hrithik Roshan, Ameesha Patel, Anupam Kher, Dalip Tahil

description: This Bollywood drama tells the story of three best friends who dream of starting a cricket training academy in Ahmedabad for very different reasons.

title: Kajraare
description: A popular singer on the run poses as a bartender and falls in love with a prostitute, but their love is threatened by a violent incident in his past.
actors: Himesh Reshammiya, Sara Loren, Amrita Singh, Gulshan Grover

title: Kalakalappu
description: Cheenu dreams of resurrecting the restaurant he has inherited to its former glory, but his brother, a compulsive gambler, loses the place to a cop.
actors: Vimal, Anjali, Shiva, Oviya

title: Kaleidoscope
description: A quiet ex-con's tenuous grip on reality starts to slip when his manipulative mother brings out a part of him he hoped to leave behind.
actors: Toby Jones, Anne Reid, Sinead Matthews, Cecilia Noble

title: Kalki
description: A scientist trying to solve one of the universe's greatest puzzles begins a romance with a much younger colleague that's haunted by a dark secret.
actors: Kishore Kumar G., Yasmin Ponnappa, Mithraboomi Saravanan

title: Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
description: When wealthy Tara weds a handsome king, she thinks she's found true love. In a cruel twist of fate, however, he takes her servant as his courtesan.
actors: Indira Varma, Sarita Choudhury, Naveen Andrews, Rekha

title: Kaminey
description: A young man pursues his dreams of wealth by breaking the law, while his twin brother tries to better his life through hard work and honesty.
actors: Shahid Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra, Deb Mukherjee, Shivkumar Subramaniam

title: Kanavu Variyam
description: Despite doubts from fellow villagers who think he’s crazy, an ambitious dropout commits himself to solving a persistent local electricity crisis.
actors: Jiya Anil Manne, Arun Chidambaram, T.P. Gajendran, Gnanasambandam

title: Kanika
description: A doctor and his colleagues who use sex-determination testing for unethical ends face retribution from a supernatural victim who seeks vengeance.
actors: Sharad Ponkshe, Smita Shewale, Chaitrali Gupte, Kamlakar Satputhe

title: Kanyaka Talkies
description: A movie theater that used to screen soft porn is transformed into a church, leading to a clash between the worlds of sexuality and sin.
actors: Murali Gopy, Lena, Alencier Ley Lopez, Indrans

description: After his ex sets his apartment on fire, Oskar establishes ground rules with his new girlfriend: no kissing and no sex. But that proves complicated.

title: Kara Bela

description: Follow the ultrarunner on his final attempt to complete more than 2,000 miles on the Appalachian Trail in record time.

actors: Himesh Reshammiya, Urmila Matondkar, Shweta Kumar, Dino Morea

description: Chipper baby boomer Kath, diva daughter Kim and hapless pal Sharon visit Papilloma, Italy, where a royal romance and knockoff fashions await.

title: Kaththi
description: A reformed crook assumes the identity of a Marxist activist fighting to protect villagers' land from a multinational corporate villain.
actors: Joseph Vijay, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Sathish

description: While walking down a road, a woman suddenly forgets who she is -- and wonders why her dress is blood-stained and her pockets are full of money.

description: After falling in love during college, architect Maddy and free spirit Payal have five wonderful years together, until a mystery suddenly divides them.

description: When a late poet leaves behind his property to a young man, the man's brother suspects the poet may have been more than just a family friend.

description: Wrongfully accused of murder, two students' last hope lies with their defense attorney, an inexperienced bumbler who's never even tried a case.

title: Keep Quiet
description: Once a prominent anti-Semitic politician in Hungary, Csanád Szegedi undergoes a dramatic change in worldview after learning of his Jewish heritage.

description: As they set their eyes on a championship, an all-Native American girls' lacrosse team seeks to change their tribe's attitudes about gender roles.

description: A stifled suburban mom and her paralyzed teenage neighbor strike up a lively friendship, but their relationship soon triggers unintended consequences.
actors: Juliette Lewis, Jonny Weston, Josh Hopkins, Cybill Shepherd

description: Just as he is preparing for his daughter's wedding, a veteran policeman is assigned to a crack team transporting a Pakistani secret agent to trial.

description: As a crazed killer blazes a trail of blood through an anxious city, a hardened cop aims to take him down by any means in this remake of “Dirty Harry.”

description: A cranky control freak must rely on his comically dysfunctional family to pull off a scam on a greedy land shark who's stolen his prized property.

description: Missing half his stripes and rejected by his herd, young zebra Khumba begins a perilous trek across the Karoo desert to find the rest of his stripes.

description: While playing matchmaker to a pair of their friends, two young university students begin developing feelings for each other.
actors: Fardeen Khan, Kareena Kapoor, Amrish Puri, Navin Nischol

description: After graduating, four college roomies -- petrified by the prospect of facing "real life" -- reluctantly step into adulthood in this ensemble comedy.

description: A tycoon is forced to participate in a dangerous scavenger hunt when a mysterious stranger kidnaps the daughter he hasn't seen in eight years.

description: When beer magnate Alfred "Freddy" Heineken is kidnapped in 1983, his abductors make the largest ransom demand in history.

description: On a remote island, elite soldiers discover their training exercise is actually an experimental death trap teeming with efficiently lethal robots.

description: In this globe-trotting thriller, a former special ops agent is forced out of retirement when his mentor is kidnapped by a ruthless criminal.

description: An idyllic camping trip to an isolated beach turns into a harrowing ordeal after a young couple discovers an abandoned tent and a lost child.
actors: Aaron Pedersen, Ian Meadows, Harriet Dyer, Aaron Glenane

description: Already coping with a bully, a mercurial older brother and summer school, 15-year-old Jack is saddled with his young cousin for an eventful weekend.

description: Peter Jackson's remake of the classic follows a group of adventurous explorers and filmmakers to Skull Island, where they search for a giant gorilla.

description: Strapped for cash, a traveling projectionist begins to run a DVD pirating business, putting him at odds with his young, skeptical son.
actors: Zhao Jun, Wang Naixun, Han Qing, Si Chao

title: Kings of Kallstadt
description: This film examines the causal links between the ancestral village of both the Trump and Heinz families, Kallstadt, and their entrepreneurial spirit.

title: Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon

actors: Jackie Shroff, Arbaaz Khan, Sohail Khan, Diya Mirza

description: A team of minstrels, including a monkey, cat and donkey, narrate folktales from the Indian regions of Rajasthan, Kerala and Punjab.

description: Animal minstrels narrate stories about a monkey's friendship with a crocodile, two monkeys' foolishness and a villager's encounter with a demon.

description: The consequences of trickery are explored in stories involving an inconsiderate husband, two greedy courtiers, and a kind man who loses everything.

title: Krisha
description: After 10 years away from her family, Krisha returns for Thanksgiving, but bitter grudges and troubling addictions threaten to ruin the event.

title: Kristy
description: Opting to stay on campus over the Thanksgiving holiday, coed Justine and a handful of friends find their break violently disrupted by a sadistic gang.
